snippet: The company said five Vyssa crib models sold in the United States between August 2010 and May 2014 were recalled.
abstract: Consumer Product Safety Commission confirms that Ikea recalled 169,000 crib mattresses after reports of two children becoming trapped in company's crib models; consumers who own recalled models are urged to check for gap between mattresses and crib frames.
lead_paragraph: The company said five Vyssa crib models sold in the United States between August 2010 and May 2014 were recalled.

headline.main: Ikea Recalls Crib Mattresses for Entrapment Hazard
headline.print_headline: Ikea Recalls Crib Mattresses for Entrapment Hazard
